trans-unit.target: None<tab>
Say<tab>Cloud Strife: Never mind...
Shout<tab>Cloud Strife: Can someone give me some gil?
Tell<tab>>> Cloud Strife: Nice shirt. Tifa Lockhart >> Eyes up here, Cloud.
Party<tab>(Cloud Strife) Where is everybody?
Standard Emotes<tab>Cloud Strife points at Bayohne.
Custom Emotes<tab>Cloud Strife wallows in self-pity...
Free Company<tab>[FC]<Cloud Strife> Can I invite my friend, Zack?

PvP Team<tab>[PvP]<Cloud Strife> There's no “I” in team!
